casebody.data:
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH & HUMAN SERVICES, ET AL.
v.
PARKER HOME CARE, LLC, ET AL. 175P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016.

Mr. Michael T. Wood, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ms. Brenda Eaddy, Assistant Attorney General, For N.C. Department of Health and Human Services, et al.

Mr. Matthew W. Wolfe, Ms. Renee J. Montgomery, Mr. Robert A. Leandro, Attorneys at Law, For Parker Home Care, LLC.

Mr. Justin Richman, Mr. Richard P. Leissner, Jr., Mr. Andrew M. Walsh, Ms. Evelyn M Savage, Ms. Tracy J. Hayes, Mrs. Carol W. Hammett, Mr. James D. Wall, Attorneys at Law, For Cardinal Innovations Healthcare Solutions, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of May 2016 by Cardinal Innovations Healthcare Solutions, et al. for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

*689"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
